page.title: 12TRANSPORT IN SEVERN STOKE
page.content: Two major transport routes traverse the area from north to south. The{M5 runs through Croome Park to the east, but with no accesss roads connecting it to the local route network. The{A38 forms the major transport route through the area, winding its way through Severn Stoke and connecting with a number of B roads. The M5 has taken a lot of pressure off the A38, which used to be very congested around Severn Stoke. There are four{bus stops}in Severn Stoke with regular services connecting the area with Worcester and Gloucester. The{River Severn}no longer serves as a major transport route for the region.
